apiData.title: Online tours - Enjoy the Louvre at home!

description.html: Visit the museum rooms and galeries, admire the palace architecture and enjoy the views!

items.title: From afar. Travelling Materials and Objects

description.html: Through materials and objects, this exhibition describes exchanges between distant worlds – exchanges often far more ancient than the explorations of the 16th century. From deepest antiquity, carnelian, lapis lazuli, ebony and ivory circulated along trade routes...

For its 5th edition, the Petite Galerie takes a closer look at the transition from the typically anonymous craftsman of the classical period to the artist of the Renaissance, featuring works by Delacroix, Rembrandt, Tintoret and more.
This third Petite Galerie exhibition focused on the connection between art and political power, from antiquity to the present day.
In its second season, the Petite Galerie explored one of the performing arts: dance. How did artists use different materials and techniques to represent movement?

items.title: Founding Myths: From Hercules to Darth Vader

description.html: The very first Petite Galerie exhibition looked into how illustrators, sculptors, painters, puppeteers, filmmakers, and musicians around the world have drawn inspiration from myths, given them form, and brought them to life.
What activities does the Louvre offer that can be enjoyed from home?

link.title: “Mona Lisa Beyond the Glass” virtual reality experience

metas.content: Online tours - Enjoy the Louvre at home!

description.html:
This site uses cookies, installed by the Musée du Louvre or by third parties, to improve your browsing experience. For more information on the purposes and to personalise your preferences by type of cookie, click on ‘Settings’.
You may modify your preferences at any time, and remove your consent to the use of cookies, by clicking on ‘Cookies’ at the bottom on each page of the website.

This website uses cookies installed by the Musée du Louvre or by third parties.
This page allows you to set your cookie preferences. For your information, technical cookies are essential for the proper functioning of our website and are used by the provider for the technical management of the network. They allow you to use the main features of the website. They are essential for doing so and therefore cannot be blocked.

rgpd.title: Learn more about the museum’s cookie policy and the cookies set out below

services.title: TECHNICAL COOKIES
services.description: Technical cookies are the cookies required for proper functioning of the website and allow you to use its main features.

services.title: THIRD-PARTY COOKIES
services.description: Video-sharing services enrich the website with multimedia content and increase its visibility. You will not be able to view videos on our website if you disable these cookies.
